title: Ben Watch Face
summary: Analog & UniqueElegant & ClassicCreative & Modern Watch Face for Android Wear

descriptionHTML:
Analog & Unique, Elegant & Classic, Creative & Modern, Watch Face for Android Wear. Also it's dynamic and a sense of military.

Feature
✔ Date
✔ Analog Time
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Concise & Power saving

COMPATIBLE WITH
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )

How to use
1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)
2. From watch: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section

Note
If you have some suggestion,you can reach us:
Email:acornsstudio@gmail.com
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
comments: ridiculous + spam stays on for 5 seconds then looks nothing like advertised just plain numbers. also sends unwanted notifications!
It's ok Would be nice to be able to change colours and customize.
It's so unique that I can show it to my friends who don't like smart watches
